name: Wolf Town Wool
description: "Wolf Town is a self sustaining economy with expanding utility over time. It shows what's possible with interactions between the ERC-20 and ERC-721 protocols and implement NFTs with updatable properties. For the very first time, your NFT can steal other NFTs (ERC-721 tokens) for you. The higher your alpha, the higher the chance stolen NFTs are assigned to you. The higher your fighting skill the more minted tokens you will accumulate. Wolf Town is pioneering new types of NFT mechanics. Fully decentralized, with centralized updatable properties."
